# Update nameservers used by OCP 4

## resolv.conf 인코딩하기 

```
cat << EOF | base64
# Generated by NetworkManager
search ocp4.igotit.co.kr igotit.ig auct_dom.igotit.co.kr
nameserver 192.168.1.254
EOF
```

## machineconfig로 노드에 배포하기

```
apiVersion: machineconfiguration.openshift.io/v1
kind: MachineConfig
metadata:
  labels:
    machineconfiguration.openshift.io/role: worker
  name: 99-worker-nameserver
spec:
  config:
    ignition:
      version: 2.2.0
    storage:
      files:
      - contents:
          source: data:text/plain;charset=utf-8;base64,IyBHZW5lcmF0ZWQgYnkgTmV0d29ya01hbmFnZXIKc2VhcmNoIG9jcDQuaWdvdGl0LmNvLmtyIGdtYXJrZXQubmggYXVjdF9kb20uYXVjdGlvbi5jby5rcgpuYW1lc2VydmVyIDE5Mi4xNjguMS4yNTQK
        filesystem: root
        mode: 0644
        path: /etc/resolv.conf
```
